Our Mission

Currently, there is a sizeable barrier of entry for home coffee roasting. Roastero's mission is to make home coffee roasting accessible to everyone, not just the brave at heart. In order to make this mission a reality, Roastero seeks to create a platform where users can create and share roast recipes that interface with our software and supported roasters. In this way, a novice roaster can download a recipe with great reviews, purchase the green coffee the recipe calls for, and then achieve the same quality an experienced roaster achieves. Additionally, Roastero looks to provide ample resources to facilitate users to move from using other users’ recipes to creating their own, thus eliminating the barrier of entry to home coffee roasting.

Our Products

Our flagship product is an open source, cross-platform coffee roasting application. Currently, our application is compatible with the FreshRoast SR700 coffee roaster, with the potential to support any computer assisted, home roasting device. In order to share recipes, we have created the Roastero Cloud Platform designed as a central hub for users to share and explore roast recipes.

Our Philosophy

We decided at an early stage that we wanted our core application to be free and open source for the life of the product. The current state of home roasting involves a lot of modification, tinkering, and hacking. Released under GPLv3, Roastero continues this legacy, allowing users to have full control over their roasters. While designing the application, we wanted to maintain this level of control while providing a simplistic interface for an inexperienced user.

When Can I Download Roastero?

Roastero is currently being meticulously tested by a small group of beta users to ensure its quality upon release. In order to fund our project, we will be launching a kickstarter in July. This campaign will provide official release dates for Roastero and the Roastero Cloud Platform.

Roastero Features

Roastero significantly extends the capabilities of the
FreshRoast SR700 while providing an open framework for other coffee roasters.

  • Clean, Intuitive Design

    Roastero includes live graph plotting in addition to a full set of gauges to provide critical roast information. With all of the roast data live, at users’ fingertips, users don’t have to rely only on their senses while roasting coffee.

  • Powerful Roaster Controls

    Control your roaster by setting a temperature value rather than heat settings with the aid of a software based PID controller. Quickly adjust temperature, time, and fan speed on the fly to achieve the perfect roast.

  • Roast Repeatability

    Once a perfect roast is created with our built in recipe system, it can be roasted exactly the same, every time.

  • Social Recipe Sharing

    With our Roastero Cloud Platform, users can easily share and download roast recipes with other roaster users allowing community collaboration and a low barrier of entry for a novice roaster.

  • Precise Roast Logging

    Never miss a degree or second with Roastero’s powerful logging features. Roastero will automatically create a log of each recipe, allowing a user add cupping notes and repeat the roast at a later date.

  • Active Community

    With an active community to share/rate recipes, provide recipe feedback, and ask questions, Roastero provides the complete package for both novice and experienced home roasters alike.
